title: (x) Nashville wedding invitation by Perky Bros. @typeid from @sethotron - modified Adobe Caslon Italic w/ swashes {Max P, Jared}
content: any idea what typeface they're using on their invitations here? its delicious: [http://bit.ly/6QqcPm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110324235245/http:/bit.ly/6QqcPm "http://bit.ly/6QqcPm")
author: typeid

comments.content:
I've heard of foxtail terminals\*, but that's ridiculous! :-)

\* [http://new.typographica.org/2009/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110324235245/http:/new.typographica.org/2009/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/ "http://new.typographica.org/2009/typeface-reviews/ff-pitu/")

hhp
Yeah, there's some serious swashiness going on here.
yeah, for real! Its really pretty, but i wonder if its customized...the terminals are leaves, which rather nicely matches the theme of the whole package..
Isn't this (based on) Adobe Caslon Swash? Seems like we saw this enleafened version recently ...

I'd agree. [Adobe Caslon Pro Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20110324235245/http:/store4.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFont&code=CASP10005300) (Swashes) gets you the base. You'll have to contact [Perky Bros](http://web.archive.org/web/20110324235245/http:/perkybros.com/) for more.
